title: Shreveport man shoots himself in leg
content:
A man leaving Willis-Knighton in the 2600 block of Greenwood Rd shot himself Sunday night.
SPD reports the shooting, which was ruled accidental, occurred around 8 p.m.
The victim was in the Willis-Knighton north parking lot, when he was trying to get in his vehicle.
He put his gun back in its holster and the gun discharged, shooting his left femur.
According to police, he was transported to University Health with life-threatening injuries.
